content:
The special unit of the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Kraken conducted tactical-special training, during which the fighters worked out the assault.

This is stated inmessageGur.

As it is noted, the coordination was focused on improving the skills during the offensive maneuver and storming the settlement for its release.

The tasks of special forces, according to the legend of exercises, also included further mines of the way of approach of additional enemy forces.

“The unit command continues to maintain a high level of combat training to ensure the protection of Ukraine's national interests at any time. The set of recruits to the assault mouth of the special unit of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Kraken is ongoing, ”the message said.

‼ ️ offensive maneuver - GUR special forces conducted large -scale tactical training

☑️ Special unit@whew_Kan Vinkor.Kraken conducted tactical-special training, during which the fighters worked out the assault.

🔗https://t.co/DsNbFsp5y0pic.twitter.com/B4AXc0kxiK

— Defence intelligence of Ukraine (@DI_Ukraine)March 26, 2024

As reported by the Armyinform, GURbegan to advertiseon Russia.
title: GUR Special Forces conducted large -scale tactical training
